-- models/customers_enriched.sql
SELECT
    c.id,
    c.name,
    COUNT(o.id) as order_count
FROM {{ ref('stg_customers') }} c
LEFT JOIN {{ ref('stg_orders') }} o
    ON c.id = o.customer_id
GROUP BY 1, 2
